aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags that are passed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys that are passed in the request

redshiftServerless:endpointAccessId.description: Filters access by the endpoint access identifier

redshiftServerless:namespaceId.description: Filters access by the namespace identifier

redshiftServerless:recoveryPointId.description: Filters access by the recovery point identifier

redshiftServerless:snapshotId.description: Filters access by the snapshot identifier

redshiftServerless:workgroupId.description: Filters access by the workgroup identifier
